*

The Thin King

Dec 2, 2012

A very dark bar where Montano and the other are spoken to twice about what they would like to order. The second time ‘round they are accosted by two large waitresses with unplaceable accents. Montano is worried that his food will be made twice and that some employee will suffer for this. But these are small matters as the place shifts in appearance and importance to being the central hub for The Men in White Masks. Of purposes unclear, they are nonetheless respected for holding a perhaps illusory power. Masquerading before a throne where The Thin King watches silently. Montano discovers when one removes his mask that they are indeed an ugly people, but first how about a slice of that decadent pizza? (Buffet sponsored by The Men in White Masks.)
